project_overview.app_description: LifeDeck is an AI-powered micro-coaching platform that delivers context-aware, actionable life-improvement cards across health, finance, productivity, and mindfulness. The app focuses on habit compounding through small daily actions, adaptive intelligence, and cross-domain insights.
core_objectives: Help users build sustainable habits through micro-actions
Provide adaptive AI coaching without information overload
Offer a genuinely useful free tier
Convert users to premium through value, not pressure
Achieve high retention via streaks and personalization

system_architecture.overall_architecture_diagram_description: Client applications (iOS, Android, Web) communicate with a unified API gateway. Requests are authenticated via JWT. Core services include User Service, Card Engine Service, Analytics Service, Notification Service, and Billing Service. Data persists in PostgreSQL with Redis caching. AI recommendations are generated asynchronously using a worker queue.

client_side.state_management: Global state managed via Redux Toolkit (Android/Web) and SwiftUI ObservableObjects (iOS). Domain-specific slices include user, cards, streaks, subscription, and notifications.
client_side.routing_strategy: iOS uses NavigationStack, Android uses React Navigation v6, Web uses Next.js App Router with route guards.
client_side.caching_strategy: Local cache via SQLite (mobile) and IndexedDB (web) with stale-while-revalidate strategy for cards and dashboard data.

server_side.data_flow_diagram: Client -> API Gateway -> Auth Middleware -> Service Layer -> Database/Cache -> Response
server_side.scalability_approach: Horizontal scaling via stateless services, Redis caching, queue-based AI processing, read replicas for analytics.

data_architecture.database_design: Relational PostgreSQL schema with normalized user data and denormalized analytics tables.
data_architecture.data_flow: Transactional data written to primary DB; analytics events streamed to aggregation tables.
data_architecture.storage_strategy: PostgreSQL for core data, Redis for cache, S3-compatible object storage for logs.
data_architecture.backup_recovery_strategy: Nightly full backups, 15-minute WAL archiving, 30-day retention.

devops_infrastructure.ci_cd_pipeline: GitHub Actions with lint, test, build, deploy stages

user_flows.onboarding_flow: Splash → Welcome → Goals → Data Sync → Quiz → Deck Ready
user_flows.authentication_flow: Apple/Google OAuth → JWT issuance → Session restore
user_flows.main_workflow: Open app → Swipe cards → Earn streaks → View dashboard

compliance_requirements.gdpr_compliance: Right to access, delete, export data supported

deployment_pipeline.rollback_procedure: Instant traffic switch to previous version
